name: Rainycafe
body: # RainyCafe > “A moderate level of noise enhances creativity compared to both low and high levels of noise. Moderate background noise induces distraction which encourages individuals to think at a higher, abstract level, and consequently exhibit higher creativity.” ## Install ``` $ git clone https://github.com/geta6/RainyCafe $ cd RainyCafe $ open rainycafe.xcodeproj ``` ## Screenshots ![](http://gyazo.com/d9ab660cf71fdd6dfd93f3282d2e37de.png) ![](http://gyazo.com/9d486cc5846999c568f008ff20362be2.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
